function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying and hoarding during the pandemic","Impact":"Waste of perishable products, resource depletion, and financial difficulties for consumers","Mitigation":"Education and public awareness campaigns on responsible purchasing, implementing purchase limits, and ensuring equitable distribution of essential goods","Technologies":"Data analytics for demand forecasting and supply chain optimization","People":"Consumers, especially those prone to panic buying","Owner":"Retailers, government, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Maladaptive behaviors driven by fear and anticipatory anxiety","Impact":"Egocentric thinking, extreme reactions, and impeded reasoning","Mitigation":"Psychological support, counseling, and mental health interventions, education on coping strategies for anxiety and fear","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, and online counseling services","People":"Individuals experiencing anticipatory anxiety","Owner":"Mental health professionals, healthcare providers, and community support organizations"},{"Description":"Contagious behavior of panic buying influenced by others","Impact":"Heightened probability of excessive purchasing and negative financial impact","Mitigation":"Social norm interventions, community support networks, and targeted communication on responsible purchasing","Technologies":"Social network analysis tools, behavioral economics insights, and social media monitoring","People":"Consumers susceptible to influence from others' panic buying","Owner":"Community organizations, social influencers, and public health authorities"}]}
